headline: Compared to Estimates, Nordson (NDSN) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Nordson (NDSN) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended April 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Nordson (NDSN) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Nordson (NDSN) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 2.54% and 1.39%, respectively, for the quarter ended April 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Nordson (NDSN) Q2 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates

headline: Nordson: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio (AP) — Nordson Corp. NDSN) on Wednesday reported fiscal second-quarter net income of $112.4 million. The Westlake, Ohio-based company said it had net income of $1.97 per share.

raw.headline: Nordson: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio (AP) — Nordson Corp. NDSN) on Wednesday reported fiscal second-quarter net income of $112.4 million. The Westlake, Ohio-based company said it had net income of $1.97 per share.

headline: Nordson’s (NASDAQ:NDSN) Q1 Sales Beat Estimates, Provides Encouraging Quarterly Revenue Guidance
summary: Manufacturing company Nordson (NASDAQ:NDSN) reported Q1 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 5% year on year to $682.9 million. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was optimistic at $730 million at the midpoint, 2.3% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.42 per share was 2.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Nordson Corporation Reports Second Quarter Fiscal 2025 Results and Third Quarter Guidance
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio, May 28, 2025--Nordson Corporation (Nasdaq: NDSN) today reported results for the fiscal second quarter ended April 30, 2025. Sales were $683 million compared to the prior year’s second quarter sales of $651 million. The second quarter 2025 sales included a favorable acquisition impact of 8%, offset by an organic sales decrease of 2% and unfavorable currency translation of less than 1%.
